answers.answer: I am getting extremely  anxious too! I have 5 days till my due date. This is my first so I keep hearing I will go over which is a little frustrating since no one really knows. Good luck :) labor will start before you know it!

Lol I am 12 days left an this is my 2 nd , I am trying lots of dif methods to help induce me quicker but I'm not sure wether they will work and I was ten days over with my 1st an had to get started cryyyy lol :(
Thanks ladies hopefully my lil one comes before his or her due date at least lol. Wishing both of u a happy and smooth delivery =)
My due date was yesterday but no sign of the baby no pain no nothing in hoping he comes for Easter otherwise I will be getting induced

question: So my 1st i was induced at 39wks due to diabetes.My 2nd i went into labor at 38 weeks naturallyAnd im currently 38+1 wks and disappointed i haven't gone into labor yet =( i was just expecting to be early again since my 2nd was. Am just sad that nothings happened at all yet not even losing my mucus plug (which i lost at 34wks with my 2nd) wish things would hurry up as im already measuring over 40wks and completely uncomfortable! I know i don't have much longer to go just wanted to have a little vent lol goodluck ladies.
title: just want to meet my little one! a little vent
